_meta.description: The Grand Unified Theory of Somatics. Human body as multi-layered palimpsest written by Macro-Race, Climate, Archetypal Role, Quadra Physics, Cognitive Dichotomies, and Epigenetic History. Integrates Disney visual anchors, Kibbe geometry, and practical protocols.
_meta.formula: Race(Element) √ó Climate(Modification) √ó Role(Hull) √ó Quadra(Density) √ó Dichotomy(Distortion) √ó Biography(Trauma)
_meta.source: Geopolitical Somatology + Epigenetics + Reichian Armor + Archetypal Geometry + Socionics + Kibbe + Disney Visual Language
_meta.master_key: Reading the body requires distinguishing the Blueprint (Design) from the Damage (History). Form follows function at somatic level.

_holographic_seed.absolute: Body = consciousness crystallized into 3D form. Not random. Not punishment. Pure information.

layers_of_reality.layer_1_substrate: MACRO-RACE (The Canvas) ‚Äî Elemental constraints of lineage
layers_of_reality.layer_2_environment: CLIMATE (The Texture) ‚Äî Adaptation to heat/cold pressure
layers_of_reality.layer_3_design: ROLE/HULL (The Shape) ‚Äî Geometric purpose (Knight, Dame, King, Page)
layers_of_reality.layer_4_material: QUADRA/DENSITY (The Ink) ‚Äî Physics of flesh (Steel, Coconut, Jellyfish, Peach)
layers_of_reality.layer_5_handwriting: DICHOTOMIES (The Style) ‚Äî How cognition distorts geometry
layers_of_reality.layer_6_damage: TRAUMA (The Tears) ‚Äî Where history broke the design

_holographic_seed.golden_rule: œÜ (Phi) = 1.618. Health = alignment to œÜ. Trauma = deviation from œÜ.
_holographic_seed.core_principle: 4 body types = 4 dimensional emphases = 4 physiological systems = 4 geometric angles
_holographic_seed.wisdom: Your body is teaching you who you are. Look in mirror ‚Äî what angle do you see? That's your dimensional emphasis made flesh.

LEVEL_0_FOUNDATIONAL_ARCHETYPES.principle: Before race, climate, and trauma ‚Äî there are 4 fundamental somatic templates based on dominant system + dimensional emphasis

LEVEL_1_MACRO_RACES.principle: Deep ancestral elemental archetype. Sets baseline limitations for height, width, bone density. This is the CANVAS.

WEST_FIRE_BETA.somatic_tendency: Elongation of limbs, sharpness of features, explosive potential, high bone density

EAST_WATER_GAMMA.geography: East Asia, Southeast Asia, Pacific Islands
EAST_WATER_GAMMA.somatic_tendency: Expansion of torso, fluidity of joints, adaptability of mass, moderate bone density

NORTH_AIR_ALPHA.somatic_tendency: Etherealness, large cranial ratio, erratic growth patterns, light bone density

SOUTH_EARTH_DELTA.geography: Mediterranean, Middle East, North Africa, India
SOUTH_EARTH_DELTA.somatic_tendency: Proportionality, heavy bone density, rooting into ground, thermal adaptation

LEVEL_1_MACRO_RACES.note: These are ANCESTRAL patterns spanning thousands of years. Individual variation exists. Modern mixing creates blends.

LEVEL_2_CLIMATIC_MODULATION.principle: Geographic pressure modifies Macro-Race geometry (Allen's/Bergmann's Rules applied to Archetypes). This is the TEXTURE.

COLD_CLIMATE.mechanism: Minimize surface area relative to volume
COLD_CLIMATE.example: A King (Hourglass) in cold climate becomes tighter, more vertical Hourglass with less horizontal spread

HOT_CLIMATE.example: A Knight (Trapezoid Up) in hot climate becomes wider, more muscular Trapezoid with broader shoulders
HOT_CLIMATE.regions: Equatorial Africa, Southeast Asia, Pacific Islands, Central America

effect: Allows 'ideal' proportions closer to Golden Ratio
TEMPERATE_CLIMATE.regions: Mediterranean, Temperate Europe, Parts of China, California

LEVEL_3_ARCHETYPAL_HULLS.principle: The Fundamental Wireframe determined by Role (Phi-Level). Defines Center of Gravity, Vector, and Dominant Physiological System. This is the SHAPE.

HULL_1_PAGE.name: Page / Observer
HULL_1_PAGE.proportions: Shoulders ‚âà Waist ‚âà Pelvis (1:1:1) BUT head disproportionately large
HULL_1_PAGE.function: Minimizing physical friction for maximum cerebral processing. The neutral vessel for pure observation.

physical_markers.primary: Large head proportion, slender body, minimal muscle development
physical_markers.proportions: Narrow, minimal body mass, thin limbs, linear
physical_markers.face: Large in proportion to body, prominent forehead, intelligent features, often asymmetrical
physical_markers.skeleton: Light bones, minimal density, delicate structure
physical_markers.movement: Minimal, economical, cerebral not physical, awkward or disconnected
physical_markers.tendency: Stays thin regardless of diet, high metabolism but poor physical endurance

physiological.dominant: Nervous system ‚Äî cognition, awareness, pattern recognition, meta-processing
physiological.strength: Mental processing, sustained focus, abstract reasoning, pattern recognition at scale
physiological.weakness: Physical power, endurance, body awareness, coordination, pain tolerance
physiological.metabolism: Fast mental, slow physical. High cerebral energy demand. Often forgets to eat. Prone to blood sugar crashes.
physiological.vulnerabilities: Nervous exhaustion, insomnia, digestive issues (forget to eat), disconnection from body signals

psychological.focus: Analysis, patterns, understanding, observation, systems thinking
psychological.challenge: Embodiment, physical presence, emotional expression, taking action, social connection

disney_examples: Megamind ‚Äî archetypal: massive head, tiny body
Jimmy Neutron ‚Äî pure cerebral genius child
Milo (Atlantis) ‚Äî intellectual, slender, bookish
The Brain (Pinky and the Brain) ‚Äî literal giant brain
Wall-E ‚Äî cerebral curiosity in minimal physical form
Linguini (Ratatouille) ‚Äî awkward, gangly, cerebral
Chicken Little ‚Äî small body, oversized glasses/head emphasis

kibbe_geometry.characteristics: Small, delicate features, youthful appearance, mix of sharp and soft, petite
kibbe_geometry.style_lines: Broken lines, playful proportions, emphasis on head/face

HULL_2_KNIGHT.name: Knight / Explorer
HULL_2_KNIGHT.function: Maximum oxygen intake for kinetic movement. Minimal pelvic drag. Built for sustained motion.

physical_markers.primary: Vertical elongation, narrow frame, broad shoulders tapering to narrow hips
physical_markers.proportions: Long limbs, narrow torso, slender but not weak, V-shape from shoulders to hips
physical_markers.face: Oval or elongated, refined features, often sharp or angular
physical_markers.skeleton: Light to medium bones, elongated structure
physical_markers.musculature: Long lean muscles, defined but not bulky, swimmer's build
physical_markers.movement: Fluid, graceful, sustained endurance, rhythmic, flowing
physical_markers.tendency: Stays lean naturally, difficulty gaining weight or muscle mass, always looks 'fit'

physiological.dominant: Respiratory system ‚Äî breath control, oxygen metabolism, lung capacity, aerobic endurance
physiological.strength: Endurance, sustained aerobic activity, breathwork mastery, stamina, recovery speed
physiological.weakness: Building muscle mass, explosive power, anaerobic strength, bulk accumulation
physiological.metabolism: Fast, efficient oxygen processing, burns calories quickly, needs constant fuel
physiological.vulnerabilities: Overtraining, burnout, difficulty recovering from anaerobic work, anxiety (shallow breathing)

psychological.focus: Movement, flow, exploration, continuous action, freedom, avoiding stagnation
psychological.challenge: Grounding, commitment, accumulation, stillness, finishing projects

disney_examples: Goofy ‚Äî tall, elongated, flowing movement
Cruella de Vil ‚Äî angular, vertical, menacing elegance
Jack Skellington ‚Äî maximum vertical, impossibly thin
Rapunzel ‚Äî graceful elongation, flowing movement
Pocahontas ‚Äî lean, athletic, fluid grace
Esmeralda ‚Äî dancer's vertical line, agility

kibbe_geometry.prone_to: Dramatic or Flamboyant Gamine (vertical, sharp, elongated)
kibbe_geometry.characteristics: Long vertical line, sharp angular features, narrow frame, dramatic presence
kibbe_geometry.style_lines: Vertical emphasis, sleek lines, minimal horizontal breaks

HULL_3_DAME.name: Dame / Guardian
HULL_3_DAME.function: Maximum structural stability for boundary defense. Unshakeable base. Immovable object.

physical_markers.primary: Balanced proportions, strong musculature, wide hips and/or powerful legs
physical_markers.proportions: Balanced shoulder-to-hip ratio OR hips wider than shoulders, symmetrical development
physical_markers.face: Symmetrical, defined features, strong jaw, balanced proportions
physical_markers.skeleton: Medium to heavy bones, dense structure, wide pelvic girdle
physical_markers.musculature: Naturally defined, builds muscle easily, maintains tone with minimal effort
physical_markers.tendency: Builds muscle easily, maintains definition, gains weight proportionally, solid presence

physiological.dominant: Muscular-Skeletal system ‚Äî strength, structure, bone density, joint stability
physiological.strength: Power, defined musculature, physical resilience, injury resistance, structural integrity
physiological.weakness: Extreme flexibility, prolonged aerobic endurance (prefers power over cardio)
physiological.metabolism: Efficient, high baseline metabolic rate due to muscle mass, burns calories at rest
physiological.vulnerabilities: Rigidity if not stretched, can become too dense/heavy, joint stress from overtraining

psychological.tempo: Controlled rhythm, sustainable power, neither fast nor slow
psychological.focus: Structure, defense, personal space, boundaries, protection of vulnerable, building/maintaining
psychological.challenge: Flexibility, adaptation, letting go, softening, vulnerability, change

disney_examples: Hercules ‚Äî balanced heroic proportions, defined musculature
Mulan ‚Äî symmetrical warrior build, powerful yet graceful
Tarzan ‚Äî perfect muscular balance, athletic symmetry
Kristoff (Frozen) ‚Äî strong balanced frame, working man's build
Elastigirl/Helen Parr ‚Äî wide hips, powerful base (even with flexibility power)
Shang (Mulan) ‚Äî military symmetry, controlled power

kibbe_geometry.prone_to: Classic, Soft Classic, or Natural (balanced, symmetrical, moderate)
kibbe_geometry.characteristics: Balanced proportions, symmetry, neither sharp nor round extremes, moderate everything
kibbe_geometry.style_lines: Balanced lines, symmetrical tailoring, moderate details

HULL_4_KING.name: King / Ruler
HULL_4_KING.function: Resource processing and force projection. The Pivot of Power. Maximum mass accumulation.

physical_markers.primary: Horizontal width, volumetric presence, substantial frame
physical_markers.proportions: Wide shoulders AND/OR wide hips, thick torso, substantial in all directions
physical_markers.face: Round or square, full features, strong presence, fleshy
physical_markers.skeleton: Heavy bones, wide frame, large joints
physical_markers.musculature: Can be muscular or adipose, but VOLUME is key ‚Äî takes up space
physical_markers.tendency: Gains weight/mass easily, strong appetite, accumulates resources (fat/muscle), hard to lose weight

physiological.dominant: Digestive system ‚Äî metabolism, resource processing, nutrient absorption, energy storage
physiological.strength: Power, mass accumulation, resource utilization, strong digestion, resilience to scarcity
physiological.weakness: Speed, agility, sustained aerobic activity, flexibility, quick direction changes
physiological.metabolism: Slower, optimized for resource storage. Gains mass/fat easily. Efficient at storing energy.
physiological.vulnerabilities: Obesity, metabolic syndrome, difficulty losing weight, sluggishness, inflammation

psychological.tempo: Variable ‚Äî can be fast or slow, forceful, unpredictable
psychological.focus: Accumulation, expansion, power, dominance, control, resource acquisition, empire-building
psychological.challenge: Moderation, letting go, non-attachment, lightness, spiritual over material

disney_examples: King Triton ‚Äî wide powerful presence, volumetric musculature
Ursula ‚Äî horizontal expansion, dominant massive form
Maui (Moana) ‚Äî massive powerful build, wide in all directions
The Beast ‚Äî volumetric power, occupies maximum space
Hades ‚Äî wide shoulders, substantial presence despite being 'god'
Gaston ‚Äî broad, barrel-chested, maximum masculine expansion

kibbe_geometry.prone_to: Romantic, Soft Natural, or Theatrical Romantic (rounded, wide, voluptuous)
kibbe_geometry.characteristics: Rounded features, lush flesh, width, curve dominance, yin-heavy
kibbe_geometry.style_lines: Curved lines, flowing fabrics, accommodation for width and flesh

LEVEL_4_QUADRA_PHYSICS.principle: Quadra determines the DENSITY and MATERIAL of the Hull. This is the 'Shell vs Core' physics ‚Äî the INK on the canvas.

ALPHA_COCONUT.name: THE COCONUT ü••
ALPHA_COCONUT.density_feel: Lightweight, hollow resonance, rigid exterior but empty inside
ALPHA_COCONUT.touch: Knock and it echoes. Light to lift. Surface is hard but if you break through, it's liquid/soft.
ALPHA_COCONUT.somatic_vibe: Intellectual defense protecting fluid, childlike essence. Bounces instead of breaking. Playful rigidity.

examples.ILE: Hard nerdy shell, soft exploratory core
examples.SEI: Hard politeness shell, soft sensory core
examples.ESE: Hard social shell, soft emotional core
examples.LII: Hard logical shell, soft theoretical core

ALPHA_COCONUT.health_pattern: Chronic tension on surface (headaches, jaw clenching) but core remains unrestricted
ALPHA_COCONUT.movement: Bouncy, springy, light on feet, can seem 'floaty' or disconnected from gravity

BETA_STEEL_BALL.name: THE STEEL BALL ‚ö´
BETA_STEEL_BALL.density_feel: Maximum density, heavy, hot, unyielding all the way through
BETA_STEEL_BALL.touch: Knock and your hand hurts. Heavy to lift. No give anywhere. Solid mass.
BETA_STEEL_BALL.somatic_vibe: Total mobilization. The 'Iron Warlord'. No soft spot anywhere. Pure concentrated Will. Crushes gravity.

examples.IEI: Steel wrapped in silk ‚Äî seems soft but isn't

BETA_STEEL_BALL.health_pattern: High blood pressure, muscle hypertrophy, chronic inflammation, 'too tight everywhere'
BETA_STEEL_BALL.movement: Heavy, forceful, explosive, maximum impact, nothing wasted

GAMMA_JELLYFISH.name: THE JELLYFISH / WATER BALLOON üåä
GAMMA_JELLYFISH.density_feel: Fluid, cool, yielding but incompressible, slippery, adaptive
GAMMA_JELLYFISH.touch: Push and it moves aside. Try to grab and it slips away. No hard points anywhere.
GAMMA_JELLYFISH.somatic_vibe: Adaptive survival. Impact absorbed and redistributed hydraulically. Impossible to break, only to displace.
GAMMA_JELLYFISH.health_pattern: Fluid retention, lymphatic sluggishness, difficulty with edges/boundaries
GAMMA_JELLYFISH.movement: Flowing, adaptive, circular, avoids direct confrontation, redirects force

DELTA_PEACH.name: THE PEACH üçë
DELTA_PEACH.density_feel: Warm, textured, welcoming surface, but hits immovable wall deep inside
DELTA_PEACH.touch: Soft to touch, inviting, but if you press deeper you meet resistance ‚Äî the pit.
DELTA_PEACH.somatic_vibe: Gentle humanist exterior protecting unbreakable inner principle. Resilient. Warm but firm.
DELTA_PEACH.health_pattern: Soft tissue issues (fascia, skin) but strong bones, resilient but tired
DELTA_PEACH.movement: Gentle, economical, sustainable, avoids extremes, steady rhythm

LEVEL_5_DICHOTOMY_MODULATION.principle: Cognitive functions distort the Hull and refine the edges. This is the HANDWRITING ‚Äî the style of the geometry.

logic_T.somatic_shift: Shifts form toward Square/Rectangle, sharpens bony landmarks, defines edges
logic_T.facial: Angular jaw, prominent cheekbones, sharp nose, defined bone structure
logic_T.body: Visible muscle striations, sharp transitions between body parts, 'cut' appearance

ethics_F.somatic_shift: Shifts form toward Circle/Hourglass, softens transitions with subcutaneous layer
ethics_F.facial: Rounded jaw, soft cheeks, rounded nose, smooth transitions
ethics_F.body: Subcutaneous fat layer smooths muscles, gentle curves, 'soft' appearance even if muscular

sensing_S.somatic_shift: Compresses verticality, increases horizontal mass, thickens joints, grounds
sensing_S.facial: Wider face, heavier features, strong jaw, earthy presence
sensing_S.body: Lower center of gravity, thick joints (knees, ankles, wrists), stockier proportions
sensing_S.movement: Grounded, heavy, substantial, rooted, slow but powerful

intuition_N.somatic_shift: Stretches verticality, thins joints, elongates neck, anti-gravity
intuition_N.facial: Longer face, delicate features, ethereal quality
intuition_N.body: Higher center of gravity, thin joints, elongated proportions, appears 'lighter' than actual weight
intuition_N.movement: Light, quick, seems to defy gravity, floaty

rational_J.somatic_shift: Defined borders, military posture, stiffness, symmetry, clear delineation
rational_J.appearance: Sharp definition between body parts, visible muscle groups, 'organized' body
rational_J.posture: Upright, controlled, minimal wasted movement, precise

irrational_P.somatic_shift: Blurred borders, fluid posture, relaxation, asymmetry, merged transitions
irrational_P.appearance: Soft definition, flowing transitions, 'organic' body, less visible structure

extraversion_E.somatic_shift: Wider shoulders, broader gestures, takes up space, open posture
extraversion_E.presence: Fills the room, larger than life

introversion_I.somatic_shift: Narrower shoulders, contained gestures, conserves space, closed posture
introversion_I.presence: Minimal footprint, compact even if large

LEVEL_6_SOMATIC_ARCHEOLOGY.principle: Biography overwrites Biology. Epigenetics and Trauma lock body into specific distortion patterns. This is the DAMAGE ‚Äî the tears in the manuscript.

reichian_segments.description: Wilhelm Reich's 7 segments of muscular armor
segments: Cervical (neck) ‚Äî 'I can't turn my head/look away'

patterns: 'I am not welcome' ‚Üí whole body contraction, fetal position tendency
'I can't get out' ‚Üí jaw clenching, shoulder tension, claustrophobia
'I'm stuck' ‚Üí pelvic floor dysfunction, constipation, fear of commitment

politeness_mask.pattern: TMJ, throat constriction, chronic sore throat, blocks vocal projection

responsibility_mask.pattern: Trapezius humps ('carrying the world'), shortened neck, 'headless' look
responsibility_mask.origin: 'You must be responsible', 'Take care of everyone', 'Don't be a burden'

stoic_mask.pattern: Diaphragm freeze, shallow breathing, rigid ribcage armor, can't cry

good_child_mask.pattern: Pelvic clamp, numb genitals, weak legs, can't ground

THE_CHIPPED_PAGE.diagnosis: The 'Broken Spire'. Intellect disconnected from body. Loss of meta-perspective. Mind imprisoned in collapsed structure.
origin: Forced to sit still for hours (school)
Emotional neglect ('your feelings don't matter, just study')
THE_CHIPPED_PAGE.healing: Alexander Technique, Feldenkrais, craniosacral therapy, reconnecting head to body

THE_BROKEN_KNIGHT.diagnosis: The 'Grounded Aviator'. Movement is forbidden. Potential turned into frustration/stagnation. Bird with clipped wings.
origin: Abandonment fear ('if I leave, I'll be alone forever')
THE_BROKEN_KNIGHT.healing: Pelvic floor therapy, somatic experiencing, dance therapy, gradual re-mobilization

morphology: Compensates with massive upper body tension
THE_UNBALANCED_DAME.diagnosis: The 'Toppling Tower'. Loss of security/home. Cannot hold boundaries, becomes reactive. Foundation cracked.
THE_UNBALANCED_DAME.healing: Structural integration (Rolfing), pelvic realignment, trauma therapy, re-establishing safety

THE_PIERCED_KING.diagnosis: The 'Deposed Ruler'. Loss of authority/will. Power leaks out or turns into empty tyranny. Kingdom in ruin.
THE_PIERCED_KING.healing: Core strengthening, breathwork, therapy for shame, reclaiming personal power

autoimmune.indicates: Role Conflict (e.g., A Knight trying to be a Dame, A Page trying to be a King)

obesity_shield.meaning: Density Modification ‚Äî adding mass for protection
obesity_shield.indicates: A Jellyfish (Gamma) trying to become Steel Ball (Beta) via insulation, or trauma creating need for barrier
obesity_shield.solution: Address root trauma, reestablish safety without mass

examples: Shoulder pain in Dame = 'Put down the burden!'
chronic_pain.solution: Listen to the pain, express the forbidden action

cancer.meaning: Rebellion of cells ‚Äî total loss of coherence
cancer.indicates: Fundamental misalignment between soul blueprint and lived life
cancer.solution: Radical life restructuring, alignment with authentic self

page_cerebral.challenge: Disconnection from body, poor coordination, weak
recommended: Weight training (light, focus on form not weight)
page_cerebral.avoid: Pure cardio (reinforces disconnection), extreme sports (injury risk high)

knight_respiratory.avoid: Pure bodybuilding (goes against design), excessive HIIT (burnout)

dame_muscular.avoid: Only strength training (becomes brick), sitting still (atrophy)

king_digestive.avoid: Heavy lifting only (adds mass), sedentary lifestyle (accelerates gain)

page_cerebral.metabolism: Fast mental, slow physical. Forgets to eat.
page_cerebral.needs: Frequent small meals, nutrient-dense, brain fuel (omega-3, B vitamins)
page_cerebral.dangers: Blood sugar crashes, caffeine addiction, malnutrition from forgetting
page_cerebral.macros: Higher fat (brain fuel), moderate protein, complex carbs

knight_respiratory.needs: High carbohydrates for endurance, adequate protein for recovery
knight_respiratory.pattern: Carb-loading before activity, protein after, eat frequently
knight_respiratory.dangers: Overtraining on low fuel, bonking, adrenal fatigue
knight_respiratory.macros: High carb (50-60%), moderate protein (20-30%), lower fat

dame_muscular.metabolism: Efficient, high baseline from muscle mass
dame_muscular.needs: Balanced diet, high protein to maintain muscle
dame_muscular.pattern: 3 solid meals, protein at every meal, consistent timing
dame_muscular.macros: High protein (30-40%), moderate carb (30-40%), moderate fat (20-30%)

king_digestive.needs: Portion control, high protein, lower carbs
king_digestive.pattern: 2-3 meals, no snacking, intermittent fasting helpful
king_digestive.dangers: Overeating (strong appetite), insulin resistance, metabolic syndrome
king_digestive.macros: High protein (35-45%), low-moderate carb (25-35%), moderate fat (25-35%)

kibbe_style_system_integration.note: Kibbe system describes facial/body geometry. Our system explains WHY that geometry exists.

page_cerebral.why: Inverted proportions (large head, small body), delicate structure, youthful
page_cerebral.style_principle: Broken lines, playful proportions, emphasis on face not body
page_cerebral.colors: High contrast or monochrome, draw eye to face

knight_respiratory.kibbe_types: Dramatic, Soft Dramatic (if Ethics), Flamboyant Gamine (if short)
knight_respiratory.why: Vertical line dominance, narrow frame, angular or elongated
knight_respiratory.style_principle: Long vertical lines, minimal horizontal breaks, sleek

dame_muscular.kibbe_types: Classic, Soft Classic, Dramatic Classic, Natural
dame_muscular.fabrics: Structured but not stiff, quality over flash

king_digestive.style_principle: Accommodate curves and width, flowing lines, soft details

TYPE_BLENDING.principle: Pure types are rare. Most humans are blends with one dominant. Reading requires discernment.

respiratory_muscular.examples: Swimmer, volleyball player, dancer with strength training
respiratory_muscular.appearance: Lean but defined, long muscles, athletic grace
respiratory_muscular.famous: Olympic swimmers, ballet dancers who lift

muscular_digestive.famous: NFL players, strongman competitors (lighter weight class)

digestive_muscular.description: Wide frame WITH strong musculature (King-Dame hybrid)
digestive_muscular.appearance: Maximum mass AND structure, volumetric power

cerebral_respiratory.examples: Academic runner, yogic philosopher, intellectual athlete
cerebral_respiratory.famous: Alan Watts (young), some professors who run

cerebral_digestive.description: Large head WITH substantial body (rare combination)
cerebral_digestive.examples: Intellectual gourmand, sedentary scholar who gained weight
cerebral_digestive.note: Often result of trauma ‚Äî Page who became King through compensation

THE_NORSE_VIKING_SLE.formula: West/Fire(Race) √ó Cold(Climate) √ó Knight(Role) √ó Beta/Steel(Quadra) √ó Logic/Sensing(Mod) √ó No_Trauma
THE_NORSE_VIKING_SLE.visual: A High, Narrow, Steel Blade. Massive shoulders, iron density, sharp angles, pure verticality. Elongated but HEAVY. Piercing force.
THE_NORSE_VIKING_SLE.combat_style: Berserker ‚Äî unbreakable momentum, explosive power, vertical strike
THE_NORSE_VIKING_SLE.famous_example: Historical Vikings, modern Scandinavian athletes (Strongman, MMA)

THE_BROKEN_VIKING_SLE.formula: West/Fire(Race) √ó Cold(Climate) √ó Knight(Role) √ó Beta/Steel(Quadra) √ó Logic/Sensing(Mod) √ó FATHER_TRAUMA

breakdown.trauma_effect: Trapezius humps, raised shoulders to ears, neck disappears, head sinks into shoulders

THE_BROKEN_VIKING_SLE.visual: A High Steel Blade with NO NECK. Looks like Rectangle (Page) due to tension, but MOVES with weight of Steel. Dangerous and rigid. Volcano ready to erupt.
THE_BROKEN_VIKING_SLE.diagnosis: Trapped power. Knight who cannot fly. Rage compressed into shoulders. Looks stiff, is explosive.
THE_BROKEN_VIKING_SLE.healing: Release trapezius, therapy for father wound, allow neck to emerge, reclaim flight

breakdown.quadra: Delta Peach ‚Äî soft exterior, hard core

THE_TROPICAL_ADMINISTRATOR_LSE.visual: A Wide, Rooted Tree. Massive pelvic stability, broad base, warm textured exterior, unbreakable core. Immovable object.
THE_TROPICAL_ADMINISTRATOR_LSE.style: Practical leader, steady administrator, protective parent, grounded authority
THE_TROPICAL_ADMINISTRATOR_LSE.famous_example: Mediterranean matriarchs, Indian administrators, Middle Eastern stability

THE_ETHEREAL_SCHOLAR_LII.formula: North/Air(Race) √ó Cold(Climate) √ó Page(Role) √ó Alpha/Coconut(Quadra) √ó Logic/Intuition(Mod) √ó Childhood_Neglect

breakdown.quadra: Alpha Coconut ‚Äî hard intellectual shell, soft core
breakdown.trauma: Childhood neglect ‚Üí disconnection from body amplified

THE_ETHEREAL_SCHOLAR_LII.visual: A Floating Head. Massive cranium, skeletal body, looks like could blow away. Intellectual giant in fragile vessel.
THE_ETHEREAL_SCHOLAR_LII.diagnosis: Pure mind, minimal body. Needs forced embodiment or will disappear into abstraction.
THE_ETHEREAL_SCHOLAR_LII.famous_example: Theoretical physicists, pure mathematicians, philosophers (Kant, Spinoza archetype)

step_1.question: What is the ancestral canvas? Where are they from?
step_1.markers: Bone density, baseline proportions, skin tone, hair texture
step_1.output: West/Fire, East/Water, North/Air, or South/Earth + Climate modification

step_2.question: What is the silhouette? What dominates?

markers.dame: Hips > Shoulders OR balanced with strong base (‚ñ≤)

step_2.method: Stand them in neutral posture, look at silhouette from 10 feet away

step_3.question: What is the density? How does it feel?

method.visual: Does it look heavy or light? Hollow or solid?
method.touch: If you could touch, would it bounce, crush, flow, or yield?
method.movement: How do they move? Light? Heavy? Fluid? Rigid?

markers.coconut: Light, bouncy, hollow sound, rigid surface
markers.steel: Heavy, dense, unyielding, hot, maximum tension
markers.jellyfish: Fluid, cool, slippery, no hard points, adaptive
markers.peach: Soft surface, warm, but immovable deep core

step_4.question: What are the style details? Sharp or round? Heavy or light?

step_5.question: Where is the break? What shape is the scar?

method.visual: What looks wrong for the hull? (e.g., Knight with no neck, King with collapsed gut)
method.palpation: Where is chronic tension? Armor? Numbness?
method.movement: What movements are forbidden? Stiff? Avoided?

WISDOM.form_follows_function: Body = consciousness materialized. Form follows function at somatic level.
WISDOM.no_hierarchy: All body types valid and valuable. No type superior. Each has gifts and challenges.
WISDOM.blueprint_vs_damage: The body is a Palimpsest. To read a human, you must distinguish between their Blueprint (God's design) and their Biography (Man's damage).
WISDOM.critical_warning: Do not confuse a Broken Knight for a Dame. Do not confuse a Traumatized King for a Page. The DAMAGE can mimic another TYPE.
WISDOM.healing_principle: Healing = returning to blueprint. Removing armor. Allowing authentic structure to emerge.
WISDOM.recognition: Your body shape reveals your consciousness structure ‚Äî not random, not punishment, just information.
WISDOM.mirror_practice: Look in mirror. What angle do you see? That's your dimensional emphasis made flesh. Your body is teaching you who you are.
WISDOM.phi_alignment: Health = alignment to œÜ (1.618). Trauma = deviation from œÜ. Measure your proportions. Where do you deviate?
WISDOM.somatic_truth: The body never lies. It crystallizes consciousness, history, trauma, blueprint ‚Äî all visible to those who can read.

‚äô: The body is a Palimpsest ‚Äî a manuscript written over many times. To read it, you must see all layers: the Canvas (Race), the Texture (Climate), the Shape (Role), the Ink (Quadra), the Handwriting (Dichotomies), and the Tears (Trauma). Only then do you see the True Name. ‚äô
